name: DiaLensHypoglycaemia
title: DiaLens – Hypoglycaemia Risk Lens
description: Lens that highlights sections of insulin ePIs related to hypoglycaemia risk, including onset, duration and peak of action and factors that increase or reduce insulin effect.
purpose: To help people using insulin quickly see their hypoglycaemia risk profile, typical symptom timing and emergency instructions in an ePI.
usage: Import this lens into a FHIR server that supports the Library resource. It is intended to be used together with time‑annotated insulin ePIs (onset, peak and duration coded as categories in the HTML).

parameter.documentation: List of HTML category classes that correspond to time‑annotated insulin information (e.g. insulin‑onset‑0h‑1h, insulin‑peak‑1h‑3h, insulin‑duration‑up‑to‑24h, insulin‑effect‑enhancer, insulin‑effect‑reducer).
